hymn.title: But you, O man of God, flee these things

layout.singingstanza: But you, O man of God, flee these things, and pur -- sue righ -- teous -- ness, god -- li -- ness, faith, love, en -- du -- rance, meek -- ness. Fight the good fight of the faith; Lay hold on the e -- ter -- nal life, to which you were called.

lyrics.stanza: But you, O man of God, flee these things, And pursue righteousness, godliness, faith, Love, endurance, meekness. Fight the good fight of the faith; Lay hold on the eternal life, to which you were called.
